rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2224, 3806, 4423, 4436, B2007}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKB1200, MKG1120, MKP1120} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: Tourism marketing provides students with a broad understanding of how key marketing concepts and theories can be applied to the tourism sector.
